import { AddIcon, AttachmentIcon, ChevronDownIcon, PhoneIcon, PlusSquareIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; import { Box, Button, CloseButton, Heading, HStack, Text, Input, Image, Modal, ModalBody, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, VStack, Badge, RadioGroup, Stack, Radio, Checkbox, Textarea, useDisclosure, ModalHeader, ModalCloseButton, ModalFooter, InputGroup, InputLeftElement, InputRightElement, Tag, Avatar, TagLabel, IconButton, Select, Popover, PopoverTrigger, Portal, PopoverContent, SimpleGrid, PopoverArrow, PopoverHeader, PopoverCloseButton, PopoverBody, Menu, MenuButton, MenuList, MenuItem, Table, TableCaption, Thead, Tr, Th, Tbody, Td, Tfoot } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { newMenuItem } from "../../scripts/newMenuItem"; import { dietTagData, DietTags, getDietData } from "../menu/dietTags"; export const NewMenuItem = () => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure() const [menuItem, setMenuItem] = useState("") const [tags, setTags] = useState(["vegan"]) const [variants, setVariants] = useState([]) const addVariant = (variant) => setVariants(variants.concat(variant)) const handleSubmit = async () => { const itemObj = JSON.parse(menuItem) console.log(itemObj) const response = await newMenuItem(itemObj) } const handleChange = (event) => { setMenuItem(event.target.value) } const NewVariant = () => { const [variant, setVariant] = useState({ name: "", price: 0 }) const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target setVariant({ ...variant, [name]: value }) } const createVariant = () => { addVariant(variant) } return ( Variantes Variants {variants.map(variant => ( ))}
Nombre Precio
{variant.name} {variant.price}
inches millimetres (mm)
} onClick={createVariant} /> ) } const DietTagsEdit = (props) => { const [onCustomInput, setIsOnCustomInput] = useState(false) const [customTag, setCustomTag] = useState("") const handleCustomTagInput = (event) => setCustomTag(event.target.value) const handleAddCustomTag = () => { addTag(customTag) setCustomTag("") } const removeTag = tagName => { setTags(tags.filter(tag => tag != tagName)) } const addTag = tagName => setTags(tags.concat(tagName)) return ( <> Etiquetas {props.tags.map((tag) => { const { imgURL, name } = getDietData(tag); const remove = () => { removeTag(tag) } return ( {name} ); })} {onCustomInput ? : }> Añadir {dietTagData.map(diet => { const add = () => { addTag(diet.name) } if (!tags.includes(diet.name)) return ( {diet.displayName}) })} } ) }; return ( <> Nuevo Plato
